alert.note: Alert for Bailey; Cochran; Hale; Hockley; Lamb; Lubbock; Lynn; Terry; Yoakum (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 26 at 3:02AM CST until February 26 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 2 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the High Wind Warning, southwest to west winds 35 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Central and western portions of the South Plains. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. For the High Wind Warning, from Noon today to 2 AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous through mid-morning. High winds this afternoon and evening may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing dust will reduce visibility.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Bailey; Cochran; Hale; Hockley; Lamb; Lubbock; Lynn; Terry; Yoakum
